reviews.review_msg: Worst CRIM prof ever! She seems well-versed in Forensics but she is very inconsiderate. Paper rubrics and instructions are vague. Unprofessional email ethics.

Lynne was good, she had interesting and engaging lectures. The expectations for the exams was clear and she gave plenty of advice to help you out as much as she could. I found the course to have a heavy bio focus for a crim course but she taught it well to non-biologists. The topic of the paper was actually really interesting and clear
I don't know if it is just me, but I feel like a most lectures irrelevant to the textbook but all the exams are based on the textbook. WHAT?
1 mt, 1 essay, 1 final. Mt was kinda difficult, final was ridiculously easy. Dr. Bell doesn't give very much direction but the class was fairly easy.
